card.note:
Kendall, Your future is created by what you do today.
Keep smiling.
We love you!
card.author: The Ippoliti's

card.note: To quote Christopher Robin to Winnie the Pooh "You must always remember. You are BRAVER than you believe. STRONGER than you seem. and SMARTER than you think."
card.author: Kallie

card.note:
I can't wait to have you back at school, it's not the same without you.
I miss you!
card.author: Love, Kallie

card.note: To a caring, sweet and cool little lady....stay strong and before you know it you will be home, hanging out with your friends and fighting with Chase over the remote!
card.author: The Yancoskies

card.note:
You are a very special person with an extra special heart. I love the twinkle you have in your eye and the smile you always have on your beautiful face.
We love you very much.
card.author: Mrs. Ross

card.note: You are an awesome kid Kendall, who is destined to be a special adult. This is only a bump in the road. You WILL overcome it and become an even stronger person!
card.author: Mr. Ross

card.note: You are an awesome kid Kendall, who is destined to be a special adult. This is only a bump in the road. You WILL overcome it and become an even stronger person!
card.author: Mr. Ross

card.note: Can't wait to sit in your lap again. Wuf! Wuf!
card.author: Tyson Ross

card.note: I only met you once -- one morning at the JRA -- but you struck me as a very special and strong young lady, capable of meeting all challenges. Sending you positive, healing energy!
card.author: Daniel Erlbaum

card.note:
Kendall,
We are sending you positive thoughts and praying for you to feel better soon!
card.author: Love, The Arbes Family

card.note: You are the sweetest girl and we know you will pull through this, We are hoping you feel better soon, XOXOXO
card.author: Lauren Ciccarelli and Family

card.note: Be brave. Be strong. Be well!
card.author: Jordan Goldenberg

card.note: I am sorry that you are broken down and out of gas!! Get repaired soon so I can drive you crazy again (I miss my gym buddy)!! Love and hugs,
card.author: Paige

card.note:
Kendall,
We can not wait to see your beautiful smile back at the bus stop, in school and around the neighborhood soon...stay positive & strong!
card.author: Love, Hayden & Cassidy xo

card.note: Kendall be the strong confident person we all know you to be. You will come through this.
card.author: The Rivers family

card.note:
Dear Sweet Kendall,
We are thinking of you and wishing you a speedy recovery. Remember to Sleep with the Angels.
We love you so much,
card.author: Grandma & Grandpa Gudel

card.note: I hope you get better soon! You are such a funny creative amazing and kind girl! I hope I'll see you around school soon! Your friend,
card.author: Helena

card.note: I love that you are always nice and funny and fun to play with! I hope that you feel better very soon!
card.author: Love, Your Friend Claudia

card.note: What I love most about you is your beautiful smile and your kind and gentle way. I loved painting your nails at Claudia's party (and you chose my favorite colors). Feel better! Xoxo
card.author: Mrs. Wein

card.note: We are thinking about you night and day and praying that the doctors, the medicine, and most of all your own personal strength work together to make you well fast. We are sending you the most positive wishes in the world
card.author: Rob, Missy, Zack, Quinn and Nick

card.note: Kendall - I love your enthusiasm with everything you do & how you are such a kind and generous friend - always. Love,
card.author: Lily Wolfe

card.note:
Kendall -
You are a fighter - you can do anything you put your mind to!!
card.author: Love, Mrs. Wolfe

card.note:
Kendall -
We are dedicating our last two games to you and wish you a speedy recovery!
card.author: Love, The Navy Seals

card.note: You never leave anyone out, and are always there to cheer us up! I know it is hard right now. STAY STRONG!!
card.author: Love, Kathryn Bielinski

card.note:
I love your super fun, crazy and peppy softball cheers.
You are the best!
card.author: Love, Sammi Huelskamp

card.note: I love Kendall because she’s so positive, is always ready to lend a hand and is the most compassionate person I know. I’m thinking of you Kendall. You’re so strong and you’re going to be just fine!
card.author: Love, Mr. Adlin

card.note:
Kendall, your a truly awesome person and a spectacular friend, so whatever you do...
DON'T STOP SHINING!!!!!!
Love,
card.author: Tessah Brooke Hardy

card.note: Kendall you are a fun, loving and great friend. I love how you always have a smile on your face. You are an awesome field hockey player and I hope you feel better soon.
card.author: Jordan Frederick

card.note: Kendall when I think of you, I think of happy! Keep on smiling and feel better soon. xo
card.author: The Fredericks

card.note: Dear Kendall, you are my awesome, cool and funny friend, stay strong and feel better soon!
card.author: Love, Natalie W

card.note: Dear Kendall, we miss you!!! Get well soon. I can't wait to see you back in school.
card.author: From, Your friends at school

card.note:
Hi Kendall,
I hope you feel better soon so you can come back to school. We miss you!
Your Friend,
card.author: Julia Rossi

card.note:
Hi Kendall,
I hope you are okay and feel better! Everyone at school misses you and hopes to see you soon, hang in there!
Sincerely,
card.author: Maeve Hinton

card.note: Kendall, your beautiful inner light shines brightly through your sparkling eyes. You are so sweet and so much fun to be around. We are sending lots of love your way!
card.author: The Niemeyer Family

card.note:
Kendall,
I hope you get better soon. Stay strong, stay strong.
Love,
card.author: Tae Tae

card.note: Kendall, The best thing I love about you is when I ask you to play, you say "YES"! Let's play soon!
card.author: Love, Benjamin Clayton

card.note: Be patient. With your body. With time. With yourself. We love you!
card.author: The Clayton Family

card.note:
Kendall,
You are such a smart, kind and loving young lady!
card.author: Aunt Kelly

card.note:
Dear Kendall, I miss you so much! Thanks for being so nice to me ~ you’re a great friend!
Love your friend,
card.author: Maria

card.note: You are a great friend with a beautiful smile. One of your smiles creates so many more! You always make me happy!
card.author: Love, Brennah Busch

card.note: I miss your kindness and positive enthusiasm. Hope you get all better very soon! We miss you!
card.author: Susanne Shaw

card.note: I miss your kindness and positive enthusiasm. Hope you get all better very soon! We miss you!
card.author: Susanne Shaw

card.note: Hope you feel better. You are a really nice girl!
card.author: Jack Shaw

card.note: Kendall: You remind me of Hershey Park – ‘The Sweetest Girl [place] on Earth! Wishing you a very speedy recovery!
card.author: Kimberly & Justin Shaw

card.note:
"You are one AMAZING girl!
Stay STRONG and we wish you a speedy recovery!
Sending many Hugs!
card.author: The Bucher's

card.note:
Keep on smiling Kendall!
Feel better soon!
card.author: Addi and Emme

card.note: You are a strong, brave and an amazing friend. I miss you so much and hope to see you at school again very soon.
card.author: Love, Ella

card.note:
Kendall,
With your bright smile, generous spirit, giving nature and patience you are the REAL DEAL!! I miss you tons and can't wait to have you over so I can make you pancakes!!
With lots of love and hugs,
card.author: Auntie Susan

card.note: Kendall, you're really good at softball and it's very fun to have you on my team with your sense of humor, your mad softball skillz, and your encouragement to the team and good attitude. I hope you get better super duper soon. WITH LOVE,
card.author: CHLOE WYNN

card.note:
Dear Kendall,
You are a great friend and I miss you! I can't wait to see you back at school :)
card.author: Love, Carly B.

card.note:
I hope you feel better. I hear that you are in the same hospital, where I had my toe surgery follow up.
I am sure you are in good hands.
card.author: Love, Sophia Brubaker

card.note: We are thinking of you! Feel better. Feel loved. You are strong. You are powerful. Love,
card.author: The Webb Family. Cecilia too!

card.note: “Hope, Love and Healing being sent your way!”
card.author: The Bartosh Family

card.note: Thinking of you and know with your strong spirit you will be feeling better soon!
card.author: Peyton & Mrs. Quinn XOXO

card.note: Remembering our special time at the beach. Sending you peaceful thoughts, salty kisses and sandy hugs!! We adore you!!!
card.author: Mrs. Thompson

card.note: I hope you feel better soon. I have been thinking of you a lot lately. I miss seeing you at school. I am sending you lots of prayers. I hope you got right back on your feet in the next few weeks.
card.author: Your friend, Lily T

card.note: “Kendall, we know you will overcome any adversity. You are strong, you are brave, you are AWESOME!”
card.author: Molly and Kelly Bunting

card.note:
When we think of you, we think of a beautiful, strong, funny, talented and caring young girl. We are so proud of your courage during the last days.
Much love,
card.author: Mr. and Mrs. Yarmark

card.note:
Kendall you are an awesome friend. You're super kind, sweet, thoughtful and talented. We all miss you and are thinking about you.
Get better soon!
card.author: Love, Olivia

card.note:
Kendall,
You're such a sweet and funny friend! You are so brave and strong! I miss you and can't wait to see your smiling face soon!
card.author: Love, Maya Yarmark

card.note: One thing I love about Kendall is that she the best softball player I know! One thing I want you to know is that we miss you and keep talking about how amazing you are!
card.author: From, Olivia Griffith

card.note:
Although we do not know each other, we are neighbors, friendly with your parents.We feel like we know you from your mom’s face book posts about how talented and kind you are. Stay strong through this event in your life. Your body has amazing healing powers.
Fondly,
card.author: The Horning Family

card.note: Kendall, You are an amazing, strong girl with an incredible spirit! Nothing can keep you down! Keep fighting!
card.author: Love, The Troy Family

card.note:
We miss you!!!
Feel better!
card.author: Collin Todd

card.note:
We miss you!!!
Feel better!
card.author: Collin Todd

card.note:
Be your authentic, awesome, amazing self ! The world needs YOU and your beautiful light.
Shine bright dear one!
card.author: Love, Mr. and Mrs. Thompson

card.note: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside of you that is greater than any obstacle. - Christian D. Larson Kendall ~ we believe in YOU!!! xoxo
card.author: The Nieberles

card.note: Kendall is a sweet girl who always has a smile on her face. We want to see that smile again soon!
card.author: Love, The Perrin Hee's

card.note:
I hope you know we all miss you and hope you feel better and come back soon!
You are really brave and strong!
card.author: Love, Your Friend Chloe Brooks

card.note: Kendall has the ability to make people feel good just by walking in a room. Her smile never goes unnoticed and is constantly acknowledged by those around her.
card.author: Love, Mom and Dad

card.note: If Kendall receives a gift she immediately thinks about who she can share it with. She is always thinking of others before herself.
card.author: Love, Mom and Dad

card.note: Given the chance, Kendall would save the world. She loves unconditionally and cares deeply about the health and welfare of others.
card.author: Love, Mom and Dad

card.note: I don't know anybody who is more beautiful both inside and out. She is the nicest person I know.
card.author: Love, Mom and Dad

card.note: We know you have some hard work ahead of you, but we've seen you on the basketball court and know you are super strong and a fighter. We are cheering for you!!! xoxo,
card.author: The Corr Family

card.note: We look forward to seeing your joyful face and beautiful smile in the neighborhood soon! We are sending prayers and hugs to you. xoxo
card.author: The Broadhurst Family

card.note: We are sending you our best wishes for your better health and healing. Take all the time you need to get better and know that when you return, there will be many happy faces to see you.
card.author: Sydney Canedo

card.note: I am so excited to get you home! You have always welcomed me and are one of the sweetest friends I have! I can't wait to spend more time with you and have some craft projects already planned for us!
card.author: Love, Libby

card.note:
We thought some funny jokes would make you smile that beautiful smile you have. What did the baby corn say to the mommy corn? - where's pop corn? What happened when the owl lost it's voice? - it didn't give a hoot!
All of our love,
card.author: The Calvitti Family

card.note: Knock, knock- who's there? Cow- cow who? No silly, cows say moo, not who! How do you make a tissue dance? - you put a little boogie in it!
card.author: The Calvitti Family

card.note: "Tag!"
card.author: From Casey

card.note:
You light up any room you are in with your beautiful smile and zest for life.
Keep fighting we love you.
card.author: The Mullins

card.note: I love that you are super fun and a great friend!!!!! Please come back to school soon we miss you and want to give you hugs.
card.author: Love, Olivia Dufour

card.note: You are such a fantastic friend and have an amazing and loving heart.
card.author: Love, Cristina

card.note: Kendall you are an awesome friend. You're super kind, sweet, thoughtful and talented. We all miss you and are thinking about you. Get better soon!
card.author: Love, Olivia Particelli

card.note: Seeing your beautiful smile after your field trip to the hospital made me smile ear to ear. I love you tons! And oh yeah…no homework for a whole week!?! Nice.
card.author: Uncle SuperDave

card.note: Dearest Miss K- you are the closest to a daughter that I will ever know and I am so proud of you! Keep smiling! You make the world a better place with your unselfish heart! Always close by!
card.author: Auntie Kelly

card.note: Keep smiling, Kendall! I love you with all of my heart and I hope your recovery is painless and rapid!
card.author: -Your Loving Cousin, Parker

card.note: Get well soon so you can once again experience all the fun and delight that life has to offer!
card.author: Love, Hunter

card.note: Kendall, I love that you are always happy and friendly. You are super fun to talk to and I can't wait for you to come back to school!
card.author: Your friend, Anna Bakker

card.note: We are thinking of you and are cheering you on as you recover!
card.author: The Bakker Family

card.note: We are thinking of you and are cheering you on as you recover!
card.author: The Bakker Family

card.note: "Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think." (A.A.Milne) We can't wait to see what you do next!
card.author: Love, Mr. and Mrs. Busch

card.note:
Dear KK,
I hope you feel and get a lot better so maybe we can ice skate or swim together sometime.
card.author: Love, Annaliese

card.note:
Kendall,
You are so sweet and kind and I love you !
Get better soon!
card.author: Love, Julianna

card.note: Kendall, you are a great friend of mine. You stand up for me. You are creative, smart, important, cool and awesome. You are one of my BFFs.
card.author: Love, Stephanie

card.note:
Kendall,
Your courage, attitude and grace under pressure are inspiring!
You are awesome!
card.author: Love, Mr. and Mrs. Clayton

card.note:
Five words that describe Kendall:
Smart. Funny. Cheerful. Smiley. Friend.
I miss you and hope you are back to school soon!
card.author: Love, Genevieve Duska

card.note: Laugh... this will make you feel better!
card.author: Love, Marielle

card.note: I love that Kendall plays sports with me and she's a great friend and person.
card.author: Chase

card.note:
Dear Kendall,
You are in our Thoughts & Prayers for a speedy recovery. You are a strong & Beautiful young lady. Stay strong in your Faith.
We love you so much.
card.author: Aunt Debbie, Brett, Cameron & Ally
